name: Mr. Bushido
description:
Welcome to the game Mr. Bushido! Originally developed for mobile devices, Mr. Bushido is a fast paced hack and slash game following a lone samurai as he vanquishes his enemies. 

How to play:

Move- Drag mouse

Attack- Left Click

Lock-On- Left Click on an Enemy (a bit buggy)

1st Ability- Unlock and swipe

2nd Ability- Left Click after your second attack

3rd Ability- Hold Left Click (a bit buggy)

4th Ability- Awakening unlocked at level 10 (not in yet)

Survive and defeat enemies to reach the max level of ten, unlock your awakening, and win the game!

Developed by Sam Foit, James Coddington, and Wally.
